name: azure-icons
title: Azure Icons
description: Access hundreds of Azure Resource icons to build your architecture diagrams
author: tiago_duarte

commands.name: azure-icons
commands.title: Azure Icons
commands.description: Browse the entire catalog of Azure Icons
commands.subtitle: Browse Icons

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
